content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite appealing. So, what price were you thinking for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euro per month would be reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than what I'm looking for. My apartment is in high demand due to its prime location. I'm aiming for at least 700 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the initial offer is too high.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, but let's try and find a middle ground. How about 650 Euro per month? This is still below my initial asking price but reflects the quality of the apartment. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro is still below my acceptable range. How about we meet at 675 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and amenities. What's your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [650] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 650 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
